definition: to invite/to request/to intercept/to solicit/to seek
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)

sentences.english: You know, Uncle Brendan, I am really glad you invited me here.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，布萊登叔叔，我真的很高興你邀請我們來。

sentences.english: The applicants who pass the qualification pre-evaluation will receive the formal invitation for Levy.
sentences.chinese: 主辦單位向資審合格的應徵人發出正式邀請。

sentences.english: Years ago, my curiosity asked me to invite him to my palace.
sentences.chinese: 我在好奇心的驅使下，邀請他到宮裏來。

sentences.english: The invitation cards were written up daintily in white and gold.
sentences.chinese: 邀請卡是用非常漂亮的白字和金字寫成的。

sentences.english: Liu often encourages foreigners to visit Shenzhen at sports meetings.
sentences.chinese: 比賽時，劉虹都會邀請外國運動員到深圳看一看。

sentences.english: He invited me to play it with the band.
sentences.chinese: 他邀請我吹奏薩克斯管，和樂隊合作。

sentences.english: He was supposed to ask her out, but he punked out at the last minute.
sentences.chinese: 他本該邀請她出去，可是到最後他卻沒膽量請了。

sentences.english: If the inviter is studying in Canada, a letter of acceptance from the school.
sentences.chinese: 如果邀請人在加學習，校方出具的錄取信。

sentences.english: An invitation for submission of bid shall clearly contain the particulars set forth in Paragraph 2 of Article 16 of this Law.
sentences.chinese: 投標邀請書應當載明本法第十六條第二款規定的事項。

sentences.english: I am pleased to inform that invitation code is no longer needed.
sentences.chinese: 很高興告訴大家，現在不再需要邀請碼了。

sentences.english: How to test the invitation code to get ah?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼樣才能獲得測試的邀請碼啊？

sentences.english: They’ll make the invitations, hang the decorations, and even serve the food.
sentences.chinese: 他們將會發邀請函，佈置裝飾品，和甚至提供食物。

sentences.english: Reggina striker Rolando Bianchi has welcomed interest from Lazio.
sentences.chinese: 雷吉納的比安奇表示樂於接受來自拉齊奧邀請。

sentences.english: It’s so nice to be able to come “down under’’ to Sydney, thanks to your kind invitation.
sentences.chinese: 你好意邀請，才使我們能夠“南下”雪梨。
即使受到邀請，我也不去。
對於您的邀請我們深表謝意。

definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to pay a visit/to call on
to hold a governmental office or post/to assume office of/to take charge of/to serve as
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
